place.placeName: Däbrä Bǝrhan Qǝddǝst Maryam Taḥtay Ruba
place.settlement: wäräda Gulo Mäkäda, ṭabiya Hagärä Sälam, qušät Taḥtay Ruba

note.ab: Däbr. Currently there are three churches at the site: a small church of St. Mary on the peak of the rock (visible from Sǝddäyto, SGM), an older and a recent churches below in the compound. Pre-historic rock paintings have been discovered in the vicinity of the site. Tabots (said to be 6 but only 3 were recalled): Mary, one marble with many names inscribed, Gabriel.

27 Mss. photographed: TRM-001 “The Faith of the Fathers”; TRM-002 “Synaxarion (March-September)”; TRM-003 “Miracles of Mary”; TRM-004 “Four Gospel, Golden Gospel”; TRM-005 “Missal”; TRM-006 “Miracles of the Trinity”; TRM-007 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; TRM-008 “Psalter”; TRM-009 “Psalter incomplete at the beginning.”; TRM-010 “Vita of Abunä Arägawi/ Vita Gäbrä Krǝstos”; TRM-011 “Vita of Abunä Arägawi/ Vita Gäbrä Krǝstos”; TRM-012 “Vita of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus”; TRM-013 “Miracles of Mary/ Miracles of Jesus”; TRM-014 “Homily on the Saviour of the World ”; TRM-015 “Miracles of Jesus”; TRM-016 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; TRM-017 “Hymns of Mäwasʿǝt”; TRM-018 “Collection of Mälkǝʿ-Poetry”; TRM-019 “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians”; TRM-020 “The Book of Qedar”; TRM-021 “Homily on Gabriel”; TRM-022 “The Book of the Matrimony Rite”; TRM-023 “Vita of Mäzgäbä Śǝllase”; TRM-024 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; TRM-025 “Homily of Ṣǝyon”; TRM-026 “Synaxarion (September - February)”; TRM-027 “Prayer of Incense”.
